subject: Create build_occ_output code node and Vitest tests for Group Members
description:
Created build_occ_output code node and 41 Vitest tests for ServiceTitan Group Members workflow. Maps business units, employees, technicians to OCC contacts data model.

Evidence:
- `tests/code-nodes/st-group-members/build-occ-output.js:1`: Code node with buildOccOutput, buildGroup, buildEmployeeMember, buildTechnicianMember, extractMobileNumbers, filterActive
- `tests/code-nodes/st-group-members/build-occ-output.test.ts:1`: 41 tests covering filterActive, extractMobileNumbers, employee/technician mapping, group building, full integration, OCC data model conformance
- `tests/code-nodes/st-group-members/build-occ-output.js:113`: `function buildOccOutput({ businessUnits, employees, technicians, errors })`
- Verification: `bunx vitest run tests/code-nodes/st-group-members/` - 41 tests passed, 0 failures
activeForm: Creating build_occ_output code node and tests
